name: unramified
description: A morphism $f : X \to Y$ of schemes is unramified if it is locally of finite type, the residue field $\kappa(x)$ is a separable algebraic extension of $\kappa(f(x))$ for all $x \in X$, and $f^\#(\mathfrak{m}_{f(x)})\mathcal{O}_{X, x} = \mathfrak{m}_x$ for all $x \in X$.
